explanation: [0-0] The video begins with two young boys and a young man in a room. The two boys are lying on their stomachs on the floor, their lower bodies covered with a printed blanket. The young man, wearing a white short-sleeved T-shirt and black pants, is sitting on a stool. They are all looking intently at a tablet propped up on the door. The walls of the room are white, a white wooden door is closed, and there is a gray printed cushion at the bottom of the wall.

[0-4] The man then sees a figure through the glass on the door, then touches the boys' heads with his hand, motioning them to lie down and sleep. Then the man shakes the red fly swatter in his hand up and down.

[4-12] The door is slowly opened by a woman with a black headscarf on her head, wearing a striped shirt and black pants, and walks into the room barefoot. The man puts his left index finger to his mouth, signaling the woman to be quiet, then continues to shake the fly swatter in his hand, watching the boys. The woman bends down and covers the boys with a blanket, the woman straightens up and walks out of the room, the man closes the door with his left hand.
